375.last_action: House passed Sub A as amended (floor amendment)
375.title: Fair Employment Practices
375.description: Expands the protections and remedies for employees against employers who pay wage differentials based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability; age or country of ancestral origin.

680.title: Vital Records
680.description: Requires that a death certificate reflect the decedent’s gender identity, as reported by the next of kin.
